meanings.definition: The quality or state of being decided or determined.
meanings.sent1: Her decidednesses in choosing a career path impressed everyone around her.
meanings.sent2: The team's decidednesses to win the championship was evident in their hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent3: His decidednesses to always wear mismatched socks made him the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: The decidednesses of the old tree to stand tall despite the harsh weather was truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The decidednesses of the detective to solve the case led to the capture of the criminal.

meanings.definition: The act of making a firm decision or choice.
meanings.sent1: After much contemplation, her decidednesses to travel the world alone surprised her friends.
meanings.sent2: His decidednesses to start his own business paid off in the long run.
meanings.sent3: The cat's decidednesses to only drink water from a crystal bowl amused the whole family.
meanings.sent4: The decidednesses of the river to carve through the mountains created a breathtaking landscape.
meanings.sent5: The student's decidednesses to excel in academics earned him a scholarship.
